name: Chicken Tarragon With Crème Fraîche
keywords: butter, chicken breast, crème fraîche, poultry, tarragon, main course
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a fireproof pan, heat the butter, and brown the chicken lightly. Season with salt and pepper, add half the tarragon. Cover with foil and bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken breasts are cooked.
Remove from oven. Stir in the crème fraîche, heat through and sprinkle with remaining tarragon leaves.
